description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=1/3. An aether packet recieved on your TransVidia starts you on your quest.   Explore a MegaCity and hak your way to fortune and adventure in this futuristic RPG.  Version 2.3 adds an AI and autobots to help you with your Haking, skill trainers, a ganger and a new corp killer.
description.short: An aether packet recieved on your TransVidia starts you on your quest.   Explore a MegaCity and hak your way to fortune and adventure in this futuristic RPG.  Version 2.3 adds an AI and autobots to help you with your Haking, skill trainers, a ganger and a new corp killer.
